name: Darryl DIAMOND, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Diamond v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Darryl DIAMOND, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 2007, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed. The Motion to Expedite is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
939 A.2d 324
Darryl DIAMOND, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 27, 2007.
